C-O1.label: C-O1: Contents of the repository
C-O1.description: The repository must not contain compiled, temporary or unnecessary files.

C-O2.label: C-O2: File extension
C-O2.description: C source files must only have .c or .h extensions.

C-O3.label: C-O3: File coherence
C-O3.description: Each source file must match a logical entity and should not contain unrelated functions.

C-O4.label: C-O4: Naming files and folders
C-O4.description: File and folder names must be clear, in English and follow the snake_case convention.

C-G1.label: C-G1: File header
C-G1.description: Each file must start with the standard EPITECH header.

C-G2.label: C-G2: Separation of functions
C-G2.description: Functions must be separated by exactly one empty line.

C-G3.label: C-G3: Indentation of preprocessor directives
C-G3.description: Preprocessor directives must be indented to match the nesting level using 4 spaces.

C-G4.label: C-G4: Global variables
C-G4.description: Global variables must be avoided; only global constants marked with 'const' are allowed.

C-G5.label: C-G5: include directive
C-G5.description: Only .h header files should be included.

C-G6.label: C-G6: Line endings
C-G6.description: Lines must end in UNIX style (\n) and not contain a trailing backslash.

C-G7.label: C-G7: trailing spaces at line end
C-G7.description: No trailing spaces must be present at the end of a line.

C-G8.label: C-G8: Leading/trailing lines
C-G8.description: No leading empty lines and at most one trailing empty line per file.

C-G9.label: C-G9: Constant values
C-G9.description: Non-trivial constants must be declared globally or as macros.

C-F1.label: C-F1: Function coherence
C-F1.description: Functions should respect the single-responsibility principle.

C-F2.label: C-F2: Naming functions
C-F2.description: Function names must be verbs in English and follow the snake_case convention.

C-F3.label: C-F3: line exceeds 80 columns
C-F3.description: Lines must not exceed 80 columns, including the newline character.

C-F5.label: C-F5: too many function parameters
C-F5.description: Functions must not take more than 4 parameters.

C-F6.label: C-F6: void in empty parameter list
C-F6.description: Functions without parameters must be declared with 'void'.

C-F7.label: C-F7: struct passed by value
C-F7.description: Structures must be passed by pointer, not by value.

C-F8.label: C-F8: comment inside function
C-F8.description: No comments allowed inside function bodies.

C-L1.label: C-L1: multiple statements on the same line
C-L1.description: A line must contain only one instruction.

C-L2.label: C-L2: incorrect indentation
C-L2.description: Use exactly 4 spaces per indentation level. No tabs allowed.

C-L3.label: C-L3: misplaced or missing space(s)
C-L3.description: Spaces must be correctly placed around operators and keywords.

C-L4.label: C-L4: misplaced curly bracket
C-L4.description: Opening braces must be alone on their line for function definitions.

C-L6.label: C-L6: incorrect blank lines
C-L6.description: Separate variable declarations from the code by one blank line.

C-V1.label: C-V1: identifier naming violation
C-V1.description: Identifiers must be in English and snake_case. Macros must use UPPER_SNAKE_CASE.

C-V2.label: C-V2: invalid struct grouping
C-V2.description: Structures must group related fields only.

C-V3.label: C-V3: pointer asterisk misplacement
C-V3.description: Asterisks must be placed correctly next to variable names.

C-C1.label: C-C1: too many conditional branches
C-C1.description: Conditional structures must have no more than 3 branches and nesting depth < 3.

C-C2.label: C-C2: complex ternary operator
C-C2.description: Ternary operators must remain simple and must not be chained.

C-H1.label: C-H1: header content violation
C-H1.description: Headers must contain only declarations and macros.

C-H2.label: C-H2: missing include guards
C-H2.description: Headers must use include guards to prevent double inclusion.

C-H3.label: C-H3: macro spans multiple statements or lines
C-H3.description: Macros must be single-statement and fit on one line.

C-A1.label: C-A1: pointer to const data missing
C-A1.description: Mark data as 'const' if it should not be modified through the pointer.

C-A2.label: C-A2: inaccurate data type
C-A2.description: Use the most appropriate data type for your variables.

C-A3.label: C-A3: missing newline at end of file
C-A3.description: Files must end with a newline character.

C-A4.label: C-A4: missing static on unused globals
C-A4.description: Global functions and variables not used externally must be marked 'static'.
